articles.description: Ollie Pope says England will keep their “fingers crossed” Ben Stokes has not suffered a serious injury after the captain struggled on the first day of the third Test against India at Lord’s.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England have 'fingers crossed' over captain's injury, says Ollie Pope

articles.description: A year ago, Amanda Anisimova was doing her best to avoid thinking about Wimbledon after failing to qualify for the main draw. Now she has a final to prepare for.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Amanda Anisimova - from failing to qualify to reaching final in a year

articles.description: Tottenham complete the signing of Mohammed Kudus from West Ham for £55m, subject to work permit.
articles.title: Mohammed Kudus: Tottenham agree £55m deal with West Ham for Ghana midfielder

articles.description: Katie Taylor holds a 2-0 advantage over Amanda Serrano as they prepare to meet in New York on Friday, but this third bout is fully warranted.
articles.title: Taylor vs Serrano 3: 'The final chapter of an all-time great sporting rivalry'

articles.description: Arsenal have world record bid in excess of £1m accepted by Liverpool for forward Olivia Smith.
articles.title: Olivia Smith: Arsenal agree £1m record fee for Liverpool forward

articles.description: Ireland's Ben Healy produces a stunning solo break to win stage six of the Tour de France while Mathieu van der Poel regains the race leader's yellow jersey.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Ben Healy wins stage six as Mathieu van der Poel regains overall lead

articles.description: After Christian Horner's departure, we analyse whether four-time world champion Max Verstappen is now more likely to remain at Red Bull.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Max Verstappen more likely to stay at Red Bull now?

articles.description: Tottenham open talks with Nottingham Forest over a possible £60m move for Morgan Gibbs-White.
articles.title: Morgan Gibbs-White: Tottenham in talks to sign Nottingham Forest midfielder

articles.description: The last time Aryna Sabalenka gave a news conference after a difficult Grand Slam loss, she handled it badly. Wimbledon was a little different.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka on Amanda Anisimova defeat and fighting emotions on and off court

articles.description: Watch live streaming and follow text updates as Finland take on Switzerland at Euro 2025.
articles.title: Finland vs Switzerland LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 stream, score, line-ups & updates
